website_summaries.verdict: Available in a wide range of cute figures, from elephant to owl to ladybug, this variable-speed humidifier with 1-gallon tank is an adorable deal.
pros: Choose the character you like the best
Humidifier runs quietly for up to 24 hours
Base is antimicrobial to deter bacteria and mildew growth

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 10 years and quiet
customer_reviews.text: I have had this humidifier for 10 years when I had my first child it recently broke due to me getting water inside the unit. I was lucky enough to find sameone again. I'll be honest I never put it on the shelf it was always on the ground and it worked great. I don't believe that it's safe to inhale essential oils for anyone, so it really doesn't matter that you cannot use essential oils with this unit. I bought another humidifier but it started making loud noise and waking up the baby so I returned it. From my experience having this one for 10 years, it works great, very quiet and no light. Recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: We love this humidifier and it has lasted us for a long time. It looks great, runs perfectly and is quiet as to not disturb a sleeping child. The only negative (with most humidifiers) is that it is difficult to clean the tank real good. But even after having this for a few years and cleaning it probably less effectively than we should, it still works great. I would highly recommend this product and if this one ever stops working, I will definitely be buying a new one. Please rate my review as helpful if you feel it was.
customer_reviews.author: Dondzl

customer_reviews.title: Radiated heat dryness cure!
customer_reviews.text: I now own 3 of the animals (frog, hippo & dragin) and the frog and dragon work great! The hippo seems to have a design flaw. It leaks after 2 hrs of vapor on high. See pictures. We sent it back and are seeking a different animal. We have radiated heat and these little guys are a perfect remedy for the moisture needed and the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: Cute does not mean functional.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to fill (no flat surface to set down), hard to clean (mold grows everywhere in here and very quickly....need to use vinegar bath every 3 days not once a week to kill mold. Lots of crevices to clean. Lots of parts that involve taking off (head of animal) then tipping upside down to fill (water drips everywhere. I donated this after a month and went with something not as cute but much, MUCH more functional.
customer_reviews.author: BlackJack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! I was looking for an ultra quiet humidifier for my son as he is a very light sleeper. This is the best humidifier I came across. He slept through the night without any trouble. Highly recommened !!
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good working humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Very good working humidifier. We recently moved from a humid to a very arid region and our 5 year old started getting nose bleeds pretty frequently. After we started using this humidifier she barely gets them anymore. Plus, she loves Hello Kitty so you can't really go wrong with this one. 5-Stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Works well but pain to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I really love how cute this humidifier is and I works really well producing a lot of of moisture. It is also very quiet which is important since my husband and I use it in our bedroom at night. Unfortunately it is pretty difficult to properly clean the inside of the water tank and all of the little crevices on the outside. If this cleaning is not done regularly mold will form both inside the tank and in the crevices in a week or less. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Daily necessity for dry spaces
customer_reviews.text: Is a daily use for us, the AC dries up very much our daughter's room. We choose this one because of capacity it holds a lot so it can stay on all night long and still has water for more, is super quiet, I could dare to say no noise at all. The cleaning and emptying is not as practical as I would like, and since the recommendation is to empty it every day it is really annoying. Even tough we use filtered water the calcification happens very often, I have to soak it in vinegar every week. Is super cute, but consider is big, it does take a lot of space, consider having a table just for it.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Leal

customer_reviews.title: don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: had my eye on this for the past few years nd finally decided to get it. so happy i did :) bigger than expected! so adorable, it’s a nice addition to my hk collection. my nose tends to get dry most nights, making it semi painful to breathe but this soothes it. easy to use, a lil bummed not bein able to use essential oils but that wasn’t a main priority in mind. the nightlight is a nice touch as well, not too bright or too dim. doesn’t make much noise either, other than the faint sound of water droplets which is so calming. definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. It is the best one yet! It can go full blast all night without needing refilled. If you keep it on mid you can use it for a full 24 hours plus. I love that the mist comes out of the trunk, it's why I chose this particular model. This is great for smaller bedrooms or right by the bed. The only problem is that the "on" light is VERY bright and can keep me awake, putting some tape over it helped fix that however.
customer_reviews.author: LDV

customer_reviews.title: love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I have to say I'm not a Hello Kitty fan, but my wife thinks they are really cute, so she saw this and wanted two, one for herself and another for an office mate. Both she and her friend, love this little thing, and being it is at work, I don't have to spend my days in its demonic unblinking gaze. I did unbox it for her, and it seemed to be decently made, not usually what you expect from a novelty item, so I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: I’m an adult and I show this off to house guests.
customer_reviews.text: True to pictures, size and function! Super simple to use and also clean out. I’m sure it’s recommended to use distilled water, however the times I used tap water it still worked great and remained clean. I also think it has a pretty good range of adding moisture to larger rooms or rooms with high ceilings. If you get sniffles or dried up nostrils with the expected awful Midwest winters, use this to humidify yourself!
customer_reviews.author: JDquelin21

customer_reviews.title: Mostly pros
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cute! My daughter loves this humidifier. She loves bears in general and the colors match my decor. It's very quiet at night. It's easy to refill and clean. Cons: I don't like the green light when it's on, which I cover up with a dark shirt in front of the humidifier. I also don't like the loud clicking sound that it makes when I turn it off. I'm always afraid it's going to wake up my child. Finally, I wish the white bear humidifier had a white power cord. It would just make it look better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST HUMIDIER TO BUY.
customer_reviews.text: For myself. The best humidifier to have and you need no filters to buy. I had my first for five years and still working. I HAVE BOUGHT THE FANCY HUMIDIFERS. AND OTHER THEY HAD TOO MUCH UPKEEP PLUS MORE EXPENSE WITH CLEANING AND NOT LASTING A SEASON AND FILTERS.
customer_reviews.author: puttputt

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Our 4th unit. First train. Looks are awesome. Filling isn’t too difficult. Noise is decent. No matter how decent I seem to clean these after a month for so they just start to smell. Clean this one daily based on the factory recommendations. It will be the last crane I buy for that reason. if I could figure out a way to stop it from smelling after it has some use even cleaned I’d be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Empire Seven

customer_reviews.title: So you wanted a hippopotamus for Christmas, eh?
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier is pretty adorable and fits in with my nursery decor very nicely. It works well, but needs to be refilled almost every night (in the winter at least). When you remove the top part, water tends to get everywhere, which is kind of annoying. The directions state you are supposed to dump the water out in the base daily, but who has time for that? Not this mom. I've done it once in three months and there is some white build up in the base. I clean it out when I notice it and it seems to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Worst humidifier I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and used many humidifiers in my lifetime, and this is by far the worst one I’ve ever purchased. It broke within 3 months of buying it. Just stopped working one day for no reason. I did notice the base was a little warm, but didn’t pay any attention to it. Also, even when it was fully functional, the cool mist is very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I dropped it after he first use and now it’s broke 🤷🏼‍♀️ So the durability sucks...
customer_reviews.author: Hil B

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: We had the frog model as a hand me down that was years and years old, it produced more vapor than this monkey model by leaps and bounds. Even when the monkey is cranked to 11 you can barely see the mist, and it doesn’t begin to cover the room, which is by no means large. Only reason we had to replace the original was bc I’m an idiot and dropped the water bin on the floor and it cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What a Disaster !!!
customer_reviews.text: Wrote a prior 5Star review - verified purchase. Can't find it. Suffering from serious sinus condition. Seam around water containder cracked!!! Took a lot of silicone gel to fix the leak. Had to have it running - doctor instruction. Now it doesn't shut off. Couldn't be more disappointed and especially during a moment of health crisis. Have not contacted manufacturer. Don't know if they would be willing to do something about it. Best recollection - used 6 times and this happened.
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quiet humidifier for kids
customer_reviews.text: It be an easy five-stars for this product if they could address one thing: the "on" light. It's pretty bright even though it's small. In a dark room, it can be distracting and it gives our toddler the excuse to get out of bed and go investigate. It'd be nice if there was a way to turn this off (short of covering it with tape or something else that will look tacky). If that doesn't bother you, consider this a 5-star review. It's a really great product other than what I mentioned above. It's quieter than others I've used, it's easy to clean, it looks nice in a kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Cgaertner

customer_reviews.title: This product has really improved!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! We got the tiger one 8 years ago for my son and it recently fell and broke. We replaced it with this elephant one and I can say it is 100% better than the last one. It uses almost the whole tank of water each night (the old one only needed to be refilled like every 5 nights!). If we close her bedroom door, the whole room will fill up with moisture. It is really great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley A. Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not in use
customer_reviews.text: We have used crane cool mist products before and had no concerns. This one we got because our son wanted a train themed room. It’s lovely, and we all got a real kick out of the design. But the mist stinks. I assume the plastic is different on this one than the animal models with clear water tanks. I cannot in good conscience continue to use it for fear that I’m diffusing VOCs or plastic toxins into my little dudes room. So it is now just a decorative item and it looks like the whole house humidifier is doing its job well enough that maybe we don’t need to use a mister anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Freeandclear2019

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the cow and it works great! We have also had the frog and the owl and never had any issues on any of the surfaces we have put it on. Our daughter has eczema and bloody nose is in dry areas and since we have put this in her room she has had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier in 2016 when my daughter was born. It's the best humidifier I've ever owned. I use it regularly because my little girl has alergies. I recommend this humidifier to a friend and she loves it too. I keep it clean by cleaning it out with humidifier liquid cleaner and I never leave it running without water. My kids ruined a humidifier once byou leaving it on dry. I recommend regular cleanings and disconnecting it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed in all the Crane humidifiers
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in all the Crane humidifiers. I wanted to like them, especially with their cute characters that my kids adore, but each one I have bought breaks or was defective from the get-go. This chick one was my last attempt (probably my 4th or 5th) and lo and behold, after maybe three days of use, it began leaking. The seller was nice enough to refund me, given that I hardly had the product one week before it stopped working, and I appreciate that. But I will no longer be buying anything that Crane makes. I'd rather invest more money for a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier itself is easy to use. But there is a lot of water building up inside the top gray cover, so water always drip onto the floor every time when I carry it to the bathroom to fill up. I guess no improvement has been made in its design for the past 8 years (I bought one in the past with a cow face).
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Visenberg

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. It’s adorable, has already greatly improved my breathing in the past couple of days, and has a light you can turn on. Most of all, this is a great price for the amount of water it holds compared to a lot of other decent humidifiers. So nice to not have to constantly refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, built well, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I use to have the penguin humidifier from same manufacturer quite a few years ago. While it served me well, I found that the reservoir began to leak over time. I had reservations about purchasing this one because I was weary about the quality and durability, but upon receiving the product I found that not only does this train model work better but it is also made better than the penguin model as well. The reservoir holds a lot of water and the smoke stack (where vapor comes out) can be twisted to direct the water vapor flow direction.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broken and shocked my finger!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times and noticed not much steam was coming out the top. I took off the tank and noticed water was splashing up where the vaporizer was supposed to be creating steam. I made a mistake and stuck my finger in the water and it shocked my finger. Going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad LY

customer_reviews.title: Got a replacement. Still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I got the penguin humidifier for our baby’s nursery. It worked okay for the first day or two but then slowly I stopped seeing the mist coming out of the top. Contacted the company and got a replacement. And now that one doesn’t work either. It’s been running non-stop on the same tank of water for 4 days and still is only 3/4 empty.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me 7 years the first time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for my first born 7 years ago and it finally gave in! Rip!! It’s a great product! The frog is very well designed. Lasted me very long! And it works!! I highly highly recommend! Not once did it have mildew build up or any foul odors coming out of it which is a huge plus for me!! Super quiet, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: This was really good until something happened and one night it had leaked all the water out. I cleaned it as well as I could (thought it was dirty) but it did the same thing next night. When we turn it on it starts to work like normal but then during the night it leaks the water out and the light burns red after that.
customer_reviews.author: Maarit

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier but basin is fragile!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these and I have cracked the basins on both! Once it is cracked, it leaks and you cannot use it. It is awkward to fill and has slipped off the edge of the sink into the sink (not a far drop) but plastic is brittle and thin, so it cracks easily. That said, it is one of the quietest humidifiers and the only one I have had that has not gotten moldy and nasty (I clean with white vinegar weekly and other brands still get nasty but these dont). I will probably buy another one, but I wish they would make it more durable.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: We had a tear drop Crane Humidifier but wanted to get another one for our daughter. This monkey one is really cute. It is bigger than the tear drop shaped one and the mist only comes out from the top of the head. It cannot be directed to a specific spot like the tear drop spout can. But we do really like that the motor sounds like a fan. It isn't super loud, but a bit louder than the tear drop model. So it almost can be advertised as having two purposes: humidifier and white noise machine. It worked great for us when we put it on at night to help little one sleep. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is so cute. The cool mist comes out as little or as high as you want depending on how you dial the amount. It came with a free 12 month subscription to parents magazine and that was an added bonus. It’s easy to clean and is not noisy at all. Very easy to use. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN... no steam
customer_reviews.text: BROKEN. I followed the direction on set up even though it's not hard. I used distilled water. No steam ever came out. I read the manual for troubleshooting and followed those steps. Still no steam. There was steam in the water based when I took the lid off but the fan isnt powerful enough to push the steam out the top. Dont buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: We loved this humidifier, at first.
customer_reviews.text: My family bought this adorable elephant humidifier for my child's room. It was exactly what we wanted, for 2 months. Unfortunately, there is a design flaw that wasn't evident at first. No matter what we do (clean it, adjust the level of mist, change the height and surface it is on), the mist collects and drips out from underneath the trunk. We wake up to a puddle underneath it, to the point where it has ruined the furniture it is placed on. Wish I could return it, a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I had one about 3 years, I bought it when my son was born to keep in the house for when he got sick.. my other one finally broke due to my mishaps and I had to buy another one. I love this. It's beautiful, no noise and shoots out amazingly! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: It is work as expected. We have one for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is work as expected. We have one for 4 years (still working perfectly) , now this is our second one. This one does not require filter, so you du not need to keep spending more money on the filters. The max level is very heavy, water can be collected on the surface next to it. I keep it little more than half way. One full bucket will last two days at least
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Can't clean
customer_reviews.text: Cute, small, quiet, tank lasted all night, variable mist level. Crane's idea of cleaning a humidifier is putting vinegar in the tank and letting it sit. In my opinion, all parts of a humidifier need to be able to be physically cleaned to remove mineral buildup and scum growth. I switched to a Miro.
customer_reviews.author: tyler cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Hello Kitty humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her “Kitty Kitty” humidifier! Very easy to keep clean. Has an adjustable knob for how fast you want the cool mist to flow. Cool mist comes out as soon as knob is turned on. There is no wait time.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but light did not last long :(
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier works well, however the light that glows when you turn it on went out within a week of using it. Can I get a replacement bulb???? Uodate: since posting my first review I have not heard from anyone about replacing the bulb. I will be sending this back... My child is terribly upset that the light only worked for like a day!
customer_reviews.author: Renee F.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from bottom after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We have had this in our daughters room since she has allergies and bought it in November. It started leaking from the bottom a few weeks ago. I thought my husband did not drain the bottom base before refilling the unit because when I had set it up it never leaked for me until 2 nights ago. We clean it weekly and follow all of the directions so I’m not too sure why it’s leaking. I will not be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good humidifier with a simple and cute design.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we had purchased and so far, it's been working well. It's quiet, easy to clean and unlike one humidifier we have in our house, the tank lines up with the base unit easily. However, the first one we had purchased failed on us. The motor began making a considerable amount of noise and cleaning it did not resolve the problem. This would have put the review at three stars instead of five but I contacted Crane and they replaced the unit upon proof of purchase. I'm keeping an eye on the replacement and the newer purchase just to make sure it stays functional. Even if it doesn't, Crane's customer service people were extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: NR Pax

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for myself (adult) since I received it! It's AWESOME!! Yes, it's a hippo, but from what I've discovered about cool mist humidifiers, this one works better and is easier to care for than most! I love that there are TWO spouts (ears) that emit cool mist. I feel like it has helped me so much this winter to not be dry and coughing every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Hound Song

customer_reviews.title: Needs little improvement for the quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this adorable humidifier to my sons room. We liked the design it’s very cute but unfortunately the item came broken! It looks like the handle of the water container made thinly which breaks so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: return not managed successfully
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and it leaked. I'v requested a return label from Amazon three times, and have heard nothing now they want to charge me for a defective item, not happy. The only return label I have received is an scan bar of sorts that I can not use on my cheap phone. I want one I can print and return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: I love this Lady Bug
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product I am adult and it work good for my sinus and asthma so this product is very good for people who has these issues it keep the are moist and that what I need being that I have dry heat and it keep my nose dry so I feel anyone who have these issues I feel you should get them products.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha

customer_reviews.title: Effective and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is me second one as we were all fighting over the first one. I run them constantly in the winter, a small hum and a little bubble sound now and then. Perfect white noise for the baby to sleep to.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have tried others and this is by far the best humidifier so far. It’s super quiet. I can adjust mist level easily. And it’s super easy to clean. Others gross me out because I can see orange or dirty spots that I just simply can’t reach to clean. Not even hot water with vinegar helps. And I clean mine weekly and empty out the basin daily.
customer_reviews.author: J.R

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a baby shower gift for my sister. Less than a year later product stopped working. Product has been taken care of per instructions provided. Disappointed due to the fact that they have had this less than a year and unable to use it anymore. Looked for trouble shooting tips online, nothing has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second humidifier...the first one I bought one year ago and is still working great. I didn't expect to like it enough to buy 2! Pros: QUIET, cute, effective Cons: none that I can come up with. also--a perk of purchasing this crane humidifier is you receive an offer for a free hear of parents magazine or you can request a refund of $6 instead of receiving the subscription.
customer_reviews.author: amamb4533

customer_reviews.title: Simple, and no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Here's the problem with humidifiers, they break. And the expensive ones break-down or leak as much as the expensive ones do too. I heard from a friend that the Crane humidifiers are hit or miss, except for the Hello Kitty model which is amazing. Curious I did some more research, the Hello Kitty model uses a different chassis than the other main line systems they use, so I rolled the dice on this one anyway. Well, two months in, it has worked flawlessly for my Daughter's new nursery, no leaks, no problems, inexpensive, easy to use, easy to understand. Basically exactly what I wanted, a humidifier I don't have to know anything about.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several humidifiers, and so far, this is my favorite for my kids. I love that the mist is cool and not steaming hot making it safer for children with curious hands. It's easy to clean and fill and really cute on top of that. It does, however create a puddle of water if it is on long enough (over night), but I'm sure any humidifier that doesn't create steam (which I assume evaporates much faster) would do the same. I believe this is mentioned by the manufacturer somewhere in the manual. It just needs a towel under it.
customer_reviews.author: Giulia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible horrible horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible horrible This is the second one in 3 months I have purchased and both have leaked! I had the penguin for 3 years and it was amazing I had to replace it because I accidentally dropped it and the water holder cracked. So I changed it up and got the cow and after about 20 minutes there would be a puddle of water under it. I thought it was defective so I went back and got another penguin thinking I’d be safe. It does the same thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier works really well. It's too dry in my room and I use it every day. Sometimes when I go out and forget to close it, it'll be close automatically. So it's safe for me to use it. And you can adjust its intensity according to your dry environment to get a comfortable moisture. At last, it's a really cute humidifier. The water comes from the hippo's ears.
customer_reviews.author: na gong

customer_reviews.title: Fine products, but not last long
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of this humidifiers (2 pig, 1 elephant and 1 monkey) in the past 3 years after my babies were born. All worked fine at the beginning, but now only one still works (one of the pig ones, but with much louder noise than before). What happened with all other three? Ans: they all broken within 1~2 year! Actually one day two started to make very loud and high-pitch noise all of sudden, and within few days both stop working. I am still struggling to find a good humidifier, a reliable brand with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier for kids
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier not only has personality, but is very functional and reliable. It leaves a perfect amount of humidity in the air, without leaving drops on the walls which some other humidifiers do. It is quiet, and cute so the kids love it. Easy to operate and refill with water, and you get at least 2 nights of all night operation with each filling. Really what else could you ask for, if you need a humidifier for your young children this along with the elephant version of this humidifier are top choices for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 crane humidifiers now in each of the kids rooms. I love the humidity they give and the kids like the animals and now a train as well. We had an elephant before this that finally started give up after 6 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and works well
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this humidifer! I haven't noticed it helping a ton with my allergies or sinuses but it does help a bit when I'm extra clogged up. The design is adorable, really easy to use and clean, and safe for my kids to touch the mist which they are oddly drawn to. We have had this product for months with no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - a few design issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a good humidifier. I've had several Crane humidifiers and have always been satisfied with them. They are easy to maintain and work well. The down side to this is the design. The cavity on the underside of the tank is so deep that it is difficult to get in there and clean it. The handle and tank design also make filling it a bit more challenging. It will not sit. You must hold it in order to fill it and sometimes that gets a bit heavy. Overall - a good product. Just a few personal hang-ups with the design that keep it from being a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Penny D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: but more than happy to give me a 30% discount on purchasing a ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!!! I have had 2 Crane Models have issues (owl one is leaking and elephant one is making weird sounds). Called customer support and of course cannot do anything... but more than happy to give me a 30% discount on purchasing a new one. Why on Earth would I purchase another one of your products with BOTH having issues with a couple of years! Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a baby gift - they love it! Whimsical design perfect for small children's room. I personally have the Crane teardrop shape humidifier and absolutely love it. Very easy to clean, I like that it does not need filters and has a good capacity water tank
customer_reviews.author: hollyb28

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and it isn’t working at all. I can hear the fan but no vapor is coming out. I tried dumping it out and starting again but nothing. I’m really bummed because I had one before and it worked perfectly for years.
customer_reviews.author: AHultquist

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our new baby's nursery. We just opened this, as our baby was just born and there is a huge crack inside the water reservoir, causing water to leak out. Our return window has closed since we've been a bit busy. If you order, make sure to check your product diligently.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Coats

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Worth it imo
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute! I do feel the quality of it could be a little better but overall it works good and looks adorable, setup was simple like any other humidifier and the cleaning isnt super complicated either
customer_reviews.author: Candy✨

customer_reviews.title: I keep trying to quit these (even tho they break)...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these because they are so cute!! But both have broken very quickly after purchasing. I use humidifiers probably half the year. That’s a lot of wear and tear but also isn’t that the point? I’m beyond my return window or I would. I love these humidifiers when they work. Do does my son. It makes daily rinsing and weekly cleaning less awful when it’s a little piggy or froggie. I wish I could send it back for a replacement but for now sticking with brands that don’t crack and motor doesn’t run out. Bummer....
customer_reviews.author: Piyuqin

customer_reviews.title: but I would recommend this humidifier to anyone who needs one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one 3 years ago, It is the only humidifier that I have purchased that last all year and does not quit. I had to order another one last year because of the sq. footage of our home and with 2 running it maintains the humidity at the right level. At the end of season, one of them quit, so I ordered another one and I'm putting the date of purchase on the bottom of it to see how long they last. but I would recommend this humidifier to anyone who needs one. I goggled "best long lasting humidifiers" and "Crane animals" what the BEST recommended one with consumer reports. They were right on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Heilman

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet and has variable levels of vapor.
customer_reviews.text: I am a mother of 5 girls and have used many different vaporizers over the years. This one is the best ever. It is easy to fill and use. I love being able to increase or decrease the amount of vapor by turning the knob. It is extremely quiet and so cute.
customer_reviews.author: karen lynn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought it when my 2yo had the flu, now I keep it on at all times. When I forget to refill it and sleep the night without it I wake up stuffy. I recommend it to every mother and anybody that loves to wake up with clear sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, cute, adorable, but doesn't last long... 💮🐚
customer_reviews.text: Cute humidifier, though it doesn't last long. It works for about a year, then it stops working. This is my 4th one, bought a new one almost every year. Nevertheless, I'll continue to buy this, as the Hello Kitty design is so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: O.H.

customer_reviews.title: Godo
customer_reviews.text: This is a good humidifier. Better than the other crane animals... it leaks far less Update These are working really well. I ordered four more! And that the insurance that’s available through Amazon just in case they break. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Just another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple tries before any output, returned
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it's great. Upon first plugging it in and turning on, things were fine and operated as expected. We turned the humidifier off for a few moments, just to check it out and to look inside. When we went to turn it back on, the green light was on but there was no output. We had to turn it on-and-off constantly before it started working again. After having this for a few days, it seems to be getting worse. Last night it took 10 minutes of constant off-and-on before we saw any output. We will be returning. On the positive side, it is super cute. It is a bit big, though, larger than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: ScaryLibrary

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this model.
customer_reviews.text: Granted I bought this because it was less expensive than other models by the same company. We've had several before, and no complaints. This one works, sort of, if you don't mind getting your floor and carpet all wet. The mist comes out of the mouth which is not aimed high enough; it comes straight out and goes down to the floor, rather than into the room. So it has little beneficial effect since the moist air never really reaches us in bed. We never had a problem with the other ones. I wish we had a different top for it to aim the mist farther up. Otherwise, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Customer # 10

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after one year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one year ago. I loved it and thought that it worked well for my daughter's room during the warmer months. However, it recently has started leaking everywhere. I cannot figure out where the leak is coming from or what to do to fix it. It's very disappointing considering it costs more than other humidifiers. I contacted the company today. I have a feeling they will not be replacing my unit, but if they do I will update this review. My advice, buy something else. You are taking your chances with this.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: The plastic used for the tank seems super cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We had this humidifier for less than a week and the plastic tank cracked causing water to leak everywhere. The plastic used for the tank seems super cheap and flimsy! Other than that we really liked this humidifier as the tank can hold a good amount of water so it doesn’t usually shut off in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: blfrana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disperse mist too well
customer_reviews.text: The mist from this humidifier goes up, then right back down. So it doesn't really make the room any more humid. Instead, after running it all night, we find it in the mornings sitting in a puddle of its own condensed mist. Our workaround has been to put a fan right next to it. That's worked pretty well. It'd be nice if there was an option to turn off the light coming from the front of the train. Our kiddo is used to his room being pitch dark at night...the light from this humidifier threw him off for a few nights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and I sure appreciate the ‘tube thing’ that comes with.
customer_reviews.text: The tube that screws in to base really, really keeps the lady bug cleaner than ever, no calcium build up which is terribly difficult to keep clean. I run it all day on highlands there is no static problems, is so quiet never hear it. Makes my winter much more comfortable. I am thinking of ordering more, so many Crane humidifiers to choose. My grandchildren love them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even greater customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I want to brag on the Crane customer service team. I dropped a full tank and broke it only a few weeks after buying. It was completely user error but I contacted Crane. The sent a replacement tank with 3 days and didn’t charge me (even though the warranty didn’t cover user error). They earned my loyalty on a great product and a great customer support team (thank you, Terry)!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Wardwell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for my baby girl a few years ago and it was an incredible price for such a great little machine. I say 'was' because it has since broken, but it lasted through a lot of abuse like being knocked off a table and dropped more than once. The cool mist feels great, it is cute and friendly, and very easy to use. I recommend using distilled water and cleaning it frequently as recommended, because hard water residue is hard to get out of the inside, but otherwise this is a fantastic item for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: liserbiser

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults too
customer_reviews.text: The hippo is cute and gets the job done! However, I do find the sound to be mildly irritating if I'm trying to work or sleep. I keep it on when I'm at work or in the other room, and that seems to be enough so that I can turn it off when it bothers me. This really saved me. The dryness was so bad in my room that my knuckles were cracking (despite putting on lotion twice a day) and my bunny was super staticky. Just after half a day of use, the static from his fur was gone, and a few days later, no more cracked knuckles!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my baby the elephant design and love it. It doesn’t leak water and its very quiet. My older son wanted one also so I let him pick which one and he chose the frog design. It leaks very bad from the bottom and has very little mist come out compared to the elephant.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Disposable product
customer_reviews.text: Works fine while it works, but we are on our second and they only ever seem to last one year before breaking. They're way to expensive to be so disposable. We will go with a different brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: K. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! It broken when I opened it!! I wish they would backage it better! Specially when its in front Cant keep it! Will return it
customer_reviews.author: Mmonro

customer_reviews.title: It's great but does not last long from its construction
customer_reviews.text: The part where it opens and closes .. it jams many times. It doesn't allow for usage due to its construction of the knob. It does not protect against chemical residue which causes it to jam. If it wasn't for that I would have given it five stars..
customer_reviews.author: lelemd

customer_reviews.title: So cute, works great.
customer_reviews.text: So cute, the mist comes out of the ears. Holds a lot of water. A bit of a pain to clean. The cord doesn’t unplug from unit. The base is odd shaped so cleaning in corners and different levels is hard. Can’t reach inside water tank to clean. Does get slimy fast.
customer_reviews.author: CUT

customer_reviews.title: Good product but leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, and quiet... however it leaks. Make sure you set it on a paper towel or something, we sat it on a desk and it warped the furniture due to the leak.
customer_reviews.author: aftin

customer_reviews.title: great humidifier, but be careful when filling up with water.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars because my sister has had one that I borrowed over the years and it's been great. Sadly, I ordered one and the second time I was filling it up with the water, the handle came unlatched and it dropped in my sink and chipped. So, be careful when filling it up with water. Other than that handle coming off easily, it's a great humidifier. Amazon was wonderful and replaced my broken one!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Had a bad unit, but Crane came through and all is well
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first Crane Penguin we've purchased, and we've had several other Crane Cool Mist Humidifiers, but this one lasted less than 1 month before it stopped emitting mist. Will not buy Crane again - apparently product quality has dropped. EDIT:: Crane replaced under warranty with a brand new unit, after I emailed their customer service. I only had to send a picture that I cut the cord on the failed unit and they shipped a new unit right out allowing me to keep the other parts as backup. The new unit has been working as expected and reliably since.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but LED is like a night light
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I got the frog version about 10 years ago and it still works well too. My only complaint is the green LED “on” light on the front is incredibly bright. The first night I used it, my baby woke up crying and when I walked in, the little green light was so bright I could have sat in a chair and read a book next to the humidifier. I put a piece of electrical tape over the light which makes it a little less cute but solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in Already Opened Box
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped in it's own box that had clearly already been opened and then just taped over with plain clear tape. Thankfully, everything inside seemed unused.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bortz

customer_reviews.title: Does not put out much moisture
customer_reviews.text: We had an old Adorable Cow humidifier which we had been very happy with until it stopped working after several years of use. When put on maximum, the old unit could put out a lot of moisture, after 10 hours the reservoir would be nearly empty. We purchased this replacement unit last fall but it does not put out nearly as much moisture. After a night of use, the water level in the reservoir is down no more than and inch or two.
customer_reviews.author: BobG

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The fan died after a month but amazon quickly replaced it. I like it a lot. Works good and looks cute. All the girls that come into my house think its adorable. I wish there was a way to run a water line to it so I never have to refill it but it gives me something to do in the winter months. Lol Update: Its almost a year later and my replacement humidifier is still going strong. I use it in my sunroom to add humidity in the winter months. It works 24/7 and won't quit. I must have gotten a bum unit the first time because this one is still going strong. Thanks Crane!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We had 2 problems with this unit...After about a week the fan started making a loud rattling sound. This went away after power cycles but I'm not sure what caused it. The more significant problem was about 1.5 months after we had it we started to notice the area it was sitting was getting really damp. Eventually we figured out it appeared to be slowly leaking out of the control knob. Unfortunately the day we discovered this was 1 day after the return window closed with Amazon so now we're stuck with a useless humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schaffter

customer_reviews.title: fun design, my son love it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about buying this product...usually the "cutesy" electronic devices seem to die out pretty quickly. We have been using this non-stop for about a month and it seems to be doing well for us. My son loves the design and can't stop saying "ooooowwwwllll" every time he sees it. I only have two gripes. The LED on the front is wicked bright, so we covered it with duct tape...and the inside of this thing is a little tricky to clean so we are following the instructions to soak in vinegar/water and that seems to be doing the job so far. Overall, I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: constantinople

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well, I'm noticing now that the tank is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of years now. It works pretty well, I'm noticing now that the tank is not letting water into chamber that creates this mist. It's some sort of pressure issue, because if i tilt the entire unit to the side, it works. However sometimes i tilt it too far, and water spills. There is a plastic spring loaded stopper that is the problem. It didn't do this when i first got it, and I've wiggled played around with the stopper, so i'm not sure what changed. other then this it still works fine. 1 tank will last the whole night no problem on full blast.
customer_reviews.author: A. Piasecki

customer_reviews.title: I saw the other Crane reviews and they were good. ONE week after it's arrival it's started blaring ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had seen the prior reviews of this ladybug humidifier and not ordered. I saw the other Crane reviews and they were good. ONE week after it's arrival it's started blaring the red light and not dispensing anything. This is bad business for Crane. They might want to improve the quality of this product before putting their name on it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, 35% humidity to 65% overnight!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this humidifier for my 11 month old baby's nursery to weather the dry winter months. We had an old humidifier with a humidity sensor in the room as well, plugged in so that the humidity sensor worked, but the humidifier element was not on. With the old humidifier, the room would never get above 35% humidity. After the first night, on the 3/4 setting, the humidity sensor read 65% in the morning! This, no doubt, works, and it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Daveypants

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Humidifier - Avoid them
customer_reviews.text: Several weeks ago I purchased the Crane OWL and the OWL worked very nicely. Because of my good experience with the Crane OWL, I decided to purchase 2 more Crane humidifiers - the DOG and COW merely to replace 2 older HOLMES humidifiers. Twas BIG mistake on my part. The DOG barely outputted anything at all. I wondered if the motor was defective. The COW was no better. I returned BOTH items immediately. I am now going to order another HOLMES humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bob

product_meta.title: Crane Adorables Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier, Filter Free, 1 Gallon, 24 Hour Run Time, Whisper Quite, for Home Bedroom Baby Nursery and Office, Elephant
product_meta.description:
Color:ElephantAdorable Design, Top Rated Performance.
Get relief from Cold and Flu Symptoms and bring Wellness to your entire Family with a Crane Adorable Humidifier. Featuring an award winning, child friendly animal designs and top rated performance, Crane’s Adorable Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifiers provide up to 24 hours of soothing moisture to help relieve the effects of dryness and congestion, helping you and your Family to breathe easy and sleep through the night peacefully. 

The moisture that humidifiers add to dry air also help alleviate many common nuisances brought on by winter heating such as static electricity, peeling wallpaper, shrinking wood, and cracks in paint and furniture. 

All Natural, Non Medicated Relief from Dryness, Cough, Cold, and Flu Symptoms.
Humidifiers are an ideal choice for relieving the discomforts of nasal congestion, dry itchy skin and hair, chapped lips, nose bleeds, and dry throats. Recent studies by the Center for Disease Control have also shown that relative humidity levels between 43% and 60% helps prevent the movement of germs, including the flu virus. 

An Adorable Baby Essential is the Perfect Baby Shower Gift!
Humidifiers are especially important for Newborns because they are Obligate Nasal Breathers, breathing only through their tiny noses for their first 4 - 6 months. Any congestion can make breathing, feeding, and sleeping incredibly difficult for your little one. Not only that, but many pediatricians recommend the use of a humidifier as a safe, non medicated, all natural alternative to help relieve congestion from the common cold and flu instead of potentially harmful over-the-counter cough and cold medicine.

Straightforward, Whisper-Quiet Operation With Clean Control Technology
Crane's cheerful designs complement any children's bedroom decor. Not only are Crane humidifiers adorable, but they are easy to use, whisper quiet, and feature Antimicrobial Material in the Base to help reduce mold and bacteria growth by up to 99.96%*. This compact, BPA Free unit uses ultrasonic technology to add humidity to the air, is more efficient than a household light bulb, and includes a built-in auto-shut-off feature that engages when the water tank is empty to ensure safety.

1 Year Manufacturer’s Warranty

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Customer support number : 1-888-599-0992 by email : customer-service@crane-usa.com
feature_bullets: VARIABLE SPEED SETTINGS: No matter the humidity level you would like to achieve we've got you covered. The Crane Adorable cool mist humidifiers offer variable output settings and an adjustable 360 degree mist lid making it easy to send the mist in any direction. The mist output is perfect for humidifying rooms up to 500 square feet, which is a standard medium to large sized room

WHISPER QUIET: Crane's Adorables humidifiers runs whisper quiet which makes it the perfect option for light sleepers, kids, and especially babies. This elephant humidifier is made with clean control anti-microbial material which reduces mold and bacteria growth by up to 99.96%

ONE GALLON TANK: The 1 gallon tank fits under a standard kitchen or bathroom sink, and has an easy to carry handle at the top. Our humidifiers are filter free, but we offer an optional demineralization filter (HS-1932) for those with excessive minerals in their water that screws directly into the tank

24 HOUR RUN TIME: The elephant humidifier runs up to 24 hours, so you don't have to worry about running it through the night. It also is equipped with an automatic shut-off safety feature that turns the unit off when the water runs out

EASY TO CLEAN: Crane's easy to clean humidifier design features a detachable bottom fill tank, which is recommended by health professionals for promoting clean humidifier habits. The water level sensor and cap also are removable, giving you access to clean the entire base. We recommend cleaning the humidifier based on frequency of use and provide many educational resources on how to clean your humidifier

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
